definitions.definition: An entertainment , outing , food , drink , or other indulgence provided by someone for the enjoyment of others.
examples: I took the kids to the zoo for a treat .
Here are some healthy Halloween treats for ghouls and witches of all ages.

definitions.definition: An unexpected gift, event etc., which provides great pleasure.
examples: It was such a treat to see her back in action on the London stage.

definitions.definition: A snack food item designed to be given to pets .
examples: I lured the cat into her carrier by throwing a couple of treats in there.

definitions.definition: A parley or discussion of terms; a negotiation .

main_definition: An entertainment , outing , food , drink , or other indulgence provided by someone for the enjoyment of others.
secondary_definitions: An unexpected gift, event etc., which provides great pleasure.
A snack food item designed to be given to pets .
( obsolete ) A parley or discussion of terms; a negotiation .
